snippet: A tainted water well features in a free-speech dispute that has landed in Texas’s highest court — the biggest test of a law meant to curb attempts to stifle public protest.
lead_paragraph: A tainted water well features in a free-speech dispute that has landed in Texas’s highest court — the biggest test of a law meant to curb attempts to stifle public protest.

headline.main: Highest Court to Weigh in on a Dispute Over Water
headline.print_headline: Highest Court to Weigh In on a Dispute Over Water
